title: Hotel Check-in

stages.name: Arrival
stages.ai_line: Good afternoon! Welcome to Grand Hotel. Do you have a reservation?
suggested_responses: Yes, I have a reservation under Kim.
Hi, checking in. Reservation number is 12345.
Yes, I booked through the website.

stages.name: Verification
stages.ai_line: Perfect! Could I see your ID or passport, please? And let me confirm - that's for two nights?

stages.name: Room Information
stages.ai_line: Your room is 507 on the 5th floor. The elevator is on your right. Is there anything else you'd like to know?

stages.name: Completion
stages.ai_line: Breakfast is from 7 to 10 AM in the restaurant on the first floor. WiFi password is on your key card. Enjoy your stay!

completion_message: Great job! You successfully checked into a hotel!
